title: Fullstack Web Developer
description:
Involved across all company solutions, I contributed to the development and maintenance of both frontend and backend of the GID ERP, covering warehouse, purchasing, sales, accounting, and logistics, tailored for distribution and SME sectors.
I also implemented e-commerce integrations and web solutions connected to the ERP.
Tech Stack: Java, Spring Boot, COOL, HTML, CSS, Javascript, Angular, Nodejs, PHP, PrestaShop
